body_html: I think this is intentional: it's better to use tf.matmul(x, w) + b directly. We are working to lock down our symbol exports so that only documented symbols are exported, but we're a bit lax at the moment.
body_text: I think this is intentional: it's better to use tf.matmul(x, w) + b directly.  We are working to lock down our symbol exports so that only documented symbols are exported, but we're a bit lax at the moment.
body: I think this is intentional: it's better to use `tf.matmul(x, w) + b` directly.  We are working to lock down our symbol exports so that only documented symbols are exported, but we're a bit lax at the moment.
